robust.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a robust person is strong and healthy
robust.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a robust man of six feet four
robust.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a robust system, organization etc is strong and not likely to have problems
robust.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The formerly robust economy has begun to weaken.
robust.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a robust object is strong and not likely to break
robust.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: a typically robust performance by the prime minister
robust.translation[0].definitions[4].def: robust food or flavours have a good strong taste
